scripts.build: mkdir -p dist &&               bunx esbuild ./index.tsx                    --bundle                    --format=esm                    --platform=browser                    --target=es2022                    --external:electron                    --outfile=dist/index.js &&               bun run copy-static
scripts.dev: bunx concurrently -n esbuild,static -c cyan,green                 "bunx esbuild ./index.tsx                      --bundle                      --format=esm                      --platform=browser                      --target=es2022                      --external:electron                      --outfile=dist/index.js                      --watch"                 "bun run copy-static --watch"
scripts.copy-static: mkdir -p dist && cp -f ../../index.html dist/ && cp -R ../../assets dist/
